sentences.sContent: ...a table festooned with a cornucopia of fruit.

words.tran: 冠状的；日冕的；头颅的；花冠的；舌尖音的

trans.tranCn: [希神]哺乳宙斯的羊角, 满装花果象征丰饶的羊角(通常用于绘画或雕刻中), 丰富, 丰饶
trans.tranOther: a container in the shape of an animal’s horn, full of fruit and flowers, used to represent a time when there are large supplies of food
